page.title: 15Tockwith Youth Group
page.content: When I go to{Youth Club}I pay 10p and then meet my friends. Sometimes we have a game of tig. It's good fun because we go up the tree and on the shed. One week we did dares and I went through Youth Club on my bike. Next week we are going swimming. There is a big hall where we play games and sometimes I get into the final and win. All the 14 year olds play on their BMX bikes trying new tricks. We have a pool table and an electronic game. The best game is load and chase at which I can beat Chris Hall who is one of the best. In the disco the girls wait for their boy friends or try to get one! At the back there is a yard where we play tig. At 8 o'clock we all go home. The Youth Club meets on Tuesday and Friday.
